hero.subtitle: Context Engineer & Full Stack Developer
about.heading: About Me
about.bio_1: Hey! I'm Jakub. I build things for the web and lately, I've been deep into making AI actually useful in real products. I work across the full stack, from Rust backends to Next.js frontends, and I care a lot about writing code that's clean and maintainable.
about.bio_2: I got into programming back in 2018, tinkering with Steam bots in Node.js. From there I went through the corporate world writing PHP (Laravel, Nette), but eventually went independent to work on things I genuinely care about. Right now I'm building rozhybejfoto.cz, a service that brings photos to life with AI, and running jaymade.app as my personal tech lab.
about.bio_3: When I'm not coding, I'm usually running trails or experimenting with biohacking. I find that getting outside is the best way to untangle a hard problem. Most of my best ideas come mid-run.
about.motto: ‚ú® 'Balance is in cycles.' I value freedom, meaningful work, and building things that matter.
experience.heading: Professional Experience
experience.job1.title: Context Engineer & Independent Developer
experience.job1.description: Orchestrating intelligent systems with spec-driven development and AI-powered workflows. Building products like rozhybejfoto.cz (AI photo animation) and jaymade.app (technology portal). Focused on Rust backends, Next.js frontends, and self-hosted infrastructure on Coolify/Hetzner.
experience.job2.title: PHP Developer at NaniNails üíÖ
experience.job2.description: Led development of custom PHP libraries for shipping APIs, implemented security enhancements, and developed data-driven reporting solutions at Czechia's leading nail cosmetics company. Reduced backend response times by ~40% through GraphQL implementation.
experience.job3.title: Web Developer at Webdevel
experience.job3.description: Specialized in developing custom WordPress themes and WooCommerce solutions. Improved site performance and implemented responsive designs for various e-commerce clients.
skills.heading: Technical Skills
projects.heading: Featured Projects
projects.rozhybejfoto.description: AI-powered photo animation service. Upload a photo and get a stunning animated video in about a minute. Simple, fast, and private.
projects.jaymade.description: My project hub where you can find all my work in one place. A growing collection of everything I'm building and experimenting with.
projects.portfolio.title: üåê Personal Portfolio
projects.portfolio.description: This website is a modern, responsive portfolio built with Vite and Tailwind CSS v4, featuring dark mode, starfield effects, and containerized deployment with Bun.
contact.heading: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question, want to start a project, or simply want to connect, feel free to reach out!
